channel.title: Item Error?
channel.description: I got this error after adding items [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:111)[/code] I am sure if i knew what it meant i could fix it. Anyone know what it means?

item.title: Item Error?
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I didnt i actually think there are 10 errors in this section and 6 more i have yet to find could some one help me i cant seem to find them

item.title: Item Error?
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

means you didn’t tab 1 or more correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Error?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

austyman:

are u trying to add a item to the shop if so be sure to add spaces and put in correct slots

The error is in the Item loading, not the shop loading, therefore the error will be in item.cfg.

@Jeremy - You must have recently added an item in item.cfg incorrectly, go back and check if you have missed anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Error?

item.description:

are u trying to add a item to the shop if so be sure to add spaces and put in correct slots

item.title: Item Error?
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I got this error after adding items

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:111)
I am sure if i knew what it meant i could fix it. Anyone know what it means?
